metadata.title: CVE-2018-12556 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The signature verification routine in install.sh in yarnpkg/website through2018-06-05 only verifies that the yarn release is signed by any (arbitrary)key in the local keyring of the user, and does not pin the signature to theyarn release key, which allows remote attackers to sign tampered yarnrelease packages with their own key.

criterions.comment: node-yarnpkg package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
